detect_time_min.description: How often to attempt to detect targets.

detect_time_max.description: How often to attempt to detect targets.

ignore_sight_range_no_los_time.description: Keep ignore sight range this amount of time after losing LOS

noise_removal_time.description: After this amount of time we clear the noise intensity

vision_intensity_rate.description: How much to increase vision if we have line of sight

vision_intensity_decay.description: How much to decay vision if no longer have line of sight

avatar_always_enemy.description: [bool]Even if they are on the same team, avatars will always be treated as hostiles.
